values: To renovate a building means to repair it, or to build new structures on it.
The old fire station was renovated into an apartment building.
v. 修复，翻新（尤指建筑物）；使恢复活力
v. 修复；翻新；重新粉刷；整修（尤指建筑物）
时态:renovated，renovating，renovates名 词:renovation
名 词:renovator
